DOC.brief_summary: The overarch goal study characterize effect ethanol cannabinoids simulate drive related cognition .
DOC.brief_title: Ethanol Cannabinoid Effects Simulated Driving Related Cognition : Sub-Study II
DOC.detailed_description: To study effect oral ethanol ( target BAC ~0.04g/dl ; equivalent consume approximately 2 drink 1 hour ) vaporize cannabis ( ~450 mg cannabis plant material THC concentration ~1.7 % ; roughly equivalent smoke approximately 1/4 marijuana cigarette , `` joint '' ) driving .
DOC.criteria: Males females 21 55 year age ( extremes include ) . Occasional current cannabis user . Experience drink 2 standard drink alcohol least lifetime . Able provide inform consent . Cannabis naïve . Alcohol naïve . Positive pregnancy screen Hearing deficit .
